content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work one morning around approximately 5 or 6 am. i was  taking my children to their grandmothers' house so she could babysit them. while travelling south on greenville-baker store rd, all of us saw an object hovering over the treetops just above the power lines. the object was round with circular white lights surronding the entire disc.  i rolled down my window to possibly hear a motor or engine.  i heard nothing.....No sounds at all. i continued driving to get to work. my children and i  were very nervous and concerned as to what we saw.I mentioned the story to my mother and never thought anymore about it.  we live near wright patterson air force base, so i just ignored the experience.  people wouldn't believe me if i told them anyway.
  i swear this experience is true.  my kids and i have never discussed this since it happened.
julie cromwell
content.summary: The disc was stationary,  hovering over treetops. it had  several white individual circular lights surrounding  the disc.  no engine could be heard. i was taking my children to school that morning. it really shook us up.

content.detailedDescription:
I was parked, facing east, in front of forbuss elementary school waiting for my child to get out of school.  as i was killing time watching some older kids riding their bikes, a bright golden light appeared to the east over some mountains, in the direct line that i was already looking.  difficult to say with any certainty, but it was probably about 4-5 miles away.  it was extremely bright.  it did not look like a reflection at all, but was definitely more of an intense light source.  it was brighter than any aircraft-based light that i have ever seen or heard of.  it did not appear to be moving at all.  i kept my eye on it and reached for my cellphone camera.  as the camera was booting up (seemed to take forever), the object simply disappeared.

immediately after the sighting, i text messaged my wife and told her i had just seen a ufo.  it was a very strange experience.
content.summary: Bright golden light hovering above mountains that suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from a night of training at my gym, on the way home its late at night about 11:00-11:10 and about 1 hour drive. i was heading south on wadsworth and as soon as i passed 44th and wads cross street, a green orb flew se over wadsworth, about 100-200 ft above my car; at first i thought it was a green fire work,because i saw lights behind it,looked as if firework exploded.But the green orb was moving too fast east to be firework in wind.The lights behind it remided me of jet or helicopter;the lights following orb were white in close v shape with a green light on one side and red on the other, i concluded a human vehicle.The light was moving faster than any jet ive ever seen fly in a suburban area, and the jet or heli was trying to keep up with it; it was moving so fast i couldnt keep up with them going 40mph in my vehicle, i tried to follow them with my eyes but lost them behind some buildings, by the time i got to a street that followed their direction both were gone from my view. i started calling my friends letting them know hwat i saw, i was freaking out,i didnt know if i should call 911 or police or what.I have never seen anything fly that low and quick in the city, everyone i called wouldnt believe what i just saw. the next morning on the way to work i was heading east on colfax toward denver and i saw two sets of 2 black goverment helicpoters flying close together over denver and more north toward lakewood. after seeing those the next morning i new something wasn't write and comfirmed that something happened the night before, so idecided to report this to mufon, ive seen this company on history channel.
content.summary: Ufo was a green orb

content.detailedDescription: i was pregnant with my second child and basically couldn't sleep beacause of heartburn. our window in the front room faced east towards  hill afb and the mountains . i noticed this really bluish white ,really bright light , it was kind of just hovering, then it broke apart into little light that zig zagged around , like bees or something, they did that for about 30 seconds and them they came back together and became the ball of light again. it was quite big, me being the dufus that i am just thought " that's weird" and went and layed down on the couch and tried to get some shut eye.
content.summary: Bright light over hill afb broke apart

content.detailedDescription:
1. where & what: i was traveling west on highway loop 1604 south of camp bullis military reservation. i was driving a 2006 ford econoline passenger van (pulling a trailer). my 20 year old son and two other adult friends all witnessed the event.

2. what made me notice? the craft was flying low and at first i thought a jet airliner was approaching an airport. as we got closer the lights and shape were not not like any aircraft i had ever seen. there was no sound.

3. what did i first think? the craft was flying low and at first i thought a jet airliner was approaching an airport for a night landing.

4. describe the ufo. the "larger than a commercial airliner" sized ufo crossed the highway moving southward. the angle that was first observed as it crossed the highway was from its side as it banked. my vehicle was within a few hundred yards of the craft as it passed slowly over the highway. there were 4,5 or 6 large white circle shaped lights within a criss-crossing lattice work. it looked like "xoxoxoxox". smaller red, yellow & greenish lights were set within the "x's". the side profile was pistol shaped on the north side (somewhat like an upside down plane in shape). the lower section also had an x weave with red, yellow and greenish lights within a lattice work. the ufo slowly banked showing a huge triangular shape. it was big. the lighting pattern became a v pattern exposing rows of 5 or 6 white lights on both exposed sides. the ufo was now on the south side of the highway banking . it moved with the hypotenuse side leading. we continued to drive. i never heard a jet sound or any loudness. it was large, spanning the highway as it passed over the highway.

5. reactions. i asked my son "what is that?" he said "ufo?". it was amazing. after the event i felt like it was a government owned ufo. i was not frightened. none of us were frightened.

6. how did we lose sight? the object moved over a tree line as we continued to drive west.

i have seen a photo on-line today from an indiana 1/31/2008 sighting. i am confident it is the same type of ufo as we witnessed. i have attached that photo. (it prompted me to report.) i included a sketch.
content.summary: Large triangular ufo crossed over hwy loop 1604 early april 5, 2008

content.detailedDescription: I was on my home to brainerd,mn  from mille lacs lake area. spotted three objects high in the sky, at around 9:08 pm this evening april 29th  two objects were orange in color, the third was a bright white color. the white colored object was almost in center of the formation, but was lower than one of the two orange objects. pulled my vehicle over, shut it off. grabbed a digital camera, took two pictures within a minute, saw a vehicle approaching from opposite way, flashed my headlights several times to flag the vehicle down, they didnt stop. then i was going to take another picture, and noticed one of the orange objects looked larger now, and appeared to be moving  a bit closer to me. i took another picture, and tried to take more, i realized my camera must be full,i believe there are 4 pictures total i took.I never thought to delete other pictures to make room until it wa too late, already home. i stayed at the same spot to watch these objects, one of the orange objects, the one not getting larger moved up, then down rapidly, and then moved and stayed near the white object, the larger orange object didnt seem to get any larger now, and i got very scared, and felt it was time to get out of the area altogether. i sarted my van and left. while on the way i felt sleepy, and a bit confused, i had some trouble driving, not alot, but disoriented and felt as though i couldnt pop my ears, like some kind of pressure, even as i write this now, i still feel some kind of pressure. i decided to not report this to local sherrifs dept, as i had done once with another experience. i believe they dont take things serious like this, and i dont want to come across as mentally unstable in any way. even to fill this out again is uncomfortable, the last thing i need is to look like an attention seeking type, that iam not.I want to note the objects were easy to see with my eyes, but they didnt show on my camera view even though i could still see them. iam not sure if these objects would be viewable in daylight,or not. the objects were still in the sky when i left for my home.This is the second time i have seen strange objects, and in the same area as once before. i never expected to see anything like this. i immediately contacted a mufon investigator as soon as i got home, because i had a number i kept. i think it would be vital for someone to look into the area where this happened,and spend time videotaping as many hours as possible, days, or night. i just feel that it is strange. iam 41 yrs. old and ive never experienced things like this my whole life until recent.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3  objects spread apart, 1 whitish, other 2 pale orangish and larger than whitish object,, orange objects moving around, one became larger.

content.detailedDescription:
By the 26 april 2008 at 9-40 pm i was loocking at the sky just out side my home when i saw 2 lites very bright flying toward south.
those two where pilotes by inteligent being cause they where flying like two kids whit ther dads car.They where flying heraticly like they where playing whit their ship...I was amaze but i figure very rapidly what they where.

those alien craft where very bright amber color ,few meters wide flying witout sound like floting on the air ...

they where very close from me (250 metres or so) at the closest.

i ad look for them for 3 minutes then they disapear...I realy wish to to more of those soon...

we are not alone !!!:)
content.summary: 2 egg globe of lights flying close my home at 250 meters heading south

content.detailedDescription: On the night of 28 april at roughly 2130 hrs, while driving from el paso texas to san antonio, a friend and i noticed a star that was dramatically brighter than the others (about 5 miles ene of ozona).  my friend commented that it must be venus, and that we should check the almanac later.  i kept watching the light and noticed that not only was it moving, but it was changing colors as well.  my friend was trying to watch the light (which appeared to have changed to a green color) and drive at the same time, and we discussed what we were looking at.  eventually the light stopped moving and turned a bright bright orange-red.  i think at that time i was able to detect a chevron-type shape to the light.  the coler became so bright it was difficult to look at, and then it disappeared completely.  the sky was absolutely beautiful and clear without a cloud in sight.  whatever we had been looking at completely vanished in less than a second while we were watching it.  as this was our second encounter with an unknown "something" in the sky on i-10 in between el paso and san antonio (the other incident being a few months back), we were both really shaken up.  we have both had more than average contact during our respective different careers with aircraft of all times, including military and balloons/airships.  i have absolutely no idea what it was that we saw.
content.summary: Observed a bright light change colors and speed and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: Today this morning at 9:09 am. mckinney, texas.  i was standing outside of my shop facing north watching a white cesna 152 slowly crossing from west to east. maybe he was going to land at the mckinney airport which was east of me.  he was quite low aproximatly 1,000 to 1,500 feet, and maybe a half mile due north of me. maybe not that far, i could clearly see the stripe down the side of the plane.  i was thinking that a slow plane was better than no plane when i noticed an oval shaped object approaching at a high rate of speed.  it came righ over the top of the cesna.  maybe 500 to 1,000 over the top of the plane.  i was about one third the size of the plane.  the object had a fuzzy white look to it almost like a cloud shaped like a fat tic-tac.  it was moving at almost a right angle to the plane, from a north north east to a south south east.  i watched it for perhaps twenty seconds trying to decide if i should get my camera and chance loosing it.  wanting to have some evidence to show, i ran inside to get the camera and you guessed it when i got outside i couldn't find it again. i took some pictures of the sky anyway hopeing for something but got nothing.  i was very excited seening the object that i ran upstairs to file a report, and i got todays date wrong so this is a correction of my original report.
content.summary: Mckinney, white oval shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I went for my usual evening walk. on my way home i noticed there were 3 lights about a mile off the coast. the 3 lights were a few hundred feet apart from each other and they just hovered in place maybe 400-500 feet in the air. no blinking lights or movement, so i ruled out commercial planes. the lights were yellowish, but seemed to shift reddish in unison as they brightened. they were hovering in a triangular pattern. 
once i realized that they weren't moving, me and my wife stood still and watched as the lights dimmed and brightened in unison for about 20 minutes. after a while the lights got to their brightest point and suddenly disappeared. 
they later reappeared in the same exact formation about a mile further to the south. the brightness of the lights was far brighter than any plane i had ever seen. at one point, one of the 3 lights split into 2 bright lights for about 10 seconds or so before becoming one light again. twenty minutes after the second triangular formation, the lights just dimmed out of sight. 
i had an odd eerie feeling in my gut as i knew i was seeing something that was out of the ordinary. when one light started to get bright, the other 2 also brightened. that was the creepiest part of the experience. the weather was drizzle and windy, so there weren't many other people around to witness what i was seeing.
content.summary: 3 lights hovering over the ocean, brightened in unison

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were playing outside and it was getting late and my friend said there was a funny looking shape in the sky i looked up and i thought it was moving so i asked him and he said it was moving then i got a good look at it and then it was gone in not even a second
content.summary: Bright  green lights  and  a blue dot

content.detailedDescription: I was camping out on the golfcourse, when i studdered upon a rock. the rock was particularly glowing in a greenish form. i looked up while holding the rock and noticed that there was a distinctive light in the sky. while i was watching the light, the light became two lights dancing around in the sky. i have 20-20 vision, so i knew that this could not have been a government aircraft from the near bye air force base. as i watched the lights from about 250 feet, i noticed that they had suddenly just disappeared. this had gone on for about 2 minutes until i saw another huge distinctive triangle shaped object. the triangle had 3 lights about the size of the first two i saw. one light was on the corner of the triangle as the other ones were to. it was about 500 feet away from the ground, and i could tell that it was watching me. it hovered around me with no sound at all for about 2 and a half minutes. it felt like there was something missing as i watched the object. after, i could see my friends were rushing towards me, so i turned around and pointed at the object, but at about that time, the object was gone.
content.summary: Distinctive triangle shape and two lights

heres just a few reports of booms and lights in the sky of many across the world.
well people i have been doing some research on this subject and it seems most of the booms
 are being caused my ufo craft.
there are many witnesses that claim they saw a craft flying low and slow and all of a sudden
 took off at incredable speed with a flash and tremendious boom noise behind.

there has also been reports from argentina of a police officer who was sent out to a rural area
 to check out some lights in the area and came across a ufo ship in the road with three beings standing next to the ship
they took him for a short past a corn field where a very strange creature was eating corn and showed him a few things then brought him back to his motorcycle and when the craft departed he said it flashed or clapped like thunder with a huge boom as it left in the blink of an eye.
there many other simular reports so i think most of these mysterious reports of booms maybe those same ships are visiting those areas.
what we now need is for someone to setup a video camara to capture one of the ships taking off with the flash and boom on it. then we can show everyone what the cause of this is. 
hope this helps answer some questions.

if you do a google search for booms heard or mysteries lights with booms you will see so many reports that i did not list here. i'll let you know if i came up with any videos.

do your own research and see what comes up.
content.summary: Booms booms and more mysteries booms read descripton

content.detailedDescription:
Every year myself and a bunch of friends travel to myrtle beach, sc for a long weekend of golfing. this year, i decided to bring along my camera and take some shots of the houses along a golf course for my fianc��� while we were playing golf on friday, april 18th, 2008.

the timestamp on the two pictures is 3:47:22 pm est and 3:47:26 pm est, so 4 seconds apart. as you can see in the pictures, a black object is in the distance in both. i don't know what it is but i recall seeing pictures from other people that look similar to these pictures i've taken. this made me submit this for examination.

i first noticed the object not when i was taking the picture, but after i put them on my computer a couple days ago which came as a surprise to me.

i also have 2 other pictures with this same object in them. i will gladly forward them if they are wanted for review.

the images are authentic, no cropping, photoshopping or image clarifying were done to them. they were shot with a canon powershot 8.0 mp digital camera. 

also, i took around 45 other photos on that day and days prior to and the object was not seen in any of these besides the 2 other pictures i referred to earlier.

take a look and i hope someone can give me an answer as to what this may be.

thanks,

rick h
content.summary: Pictures of an unidentified object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I have wanted to share this event for years and did not know how till today.  me, my sons, and my mother were at one of our pastures late in the afternoon when the sun was going down but still plenty of light when i looked up over the tree line about 10 acres away and what seemed to be 12 or so flashing red orange lights flitering up and down in and out with out hitting each other much like fire flies or a swarm of birds fly.  they seemed to be heading west toward texas and were soundless.  i quickly picked up my binoculars and noticed the lights seemed to fill a bubble like top and reflect off of what appeared to be a metallic roundish backside.  the entire event only took about 15 seconds as i watched them move on to the west. if anybody has seen anything like this or know of other episodes please write back as this has always intriged me. thanks
content.summary: Twelve lights flittering soundlessly like fire flies across my pastue

content.detailedDescription: I have wanted to share this event for years and did not know how till today.  me, my sons, and my mother were at one of our pastures late in the afternoon when the sun was going down but still plenty of light when i looked up over the tree line about 10 acres away and what seemed to be 12 or so flashing red orange lights flitering up and down in and out with out hitting each other much like fire flies or a swarm of birds fly.  they seemed to be heading west toward texas and were soundless.  i quickly picked up my binoculars and noticed the lights seemed to fill a bubble like top and reflect off of what appeared to be a metallic roundish backside.  the entire event only took about 15 seconds as i watched them move on to the west. if anybody has seen anything like this or know of other episodes please write back as this has always intriged me. thanks
content.summary: Twelve lights flittering soundlessly like fire flies across my pastue

content.detailedDescription:
Friends and i were out that thursday evening, and walked down to the downtown square, at lake sumter landing, where some vendors were selling their wares at the down town square.

our car was parked in the parking lot of the new hotel that had only been completed last year, and is located right on the lake.

as we were going over the small wooden bridge, back to the parking lot to return to our car, i saw a white orb, descend from the sky, in mostly a perpendicular position to the horizon.  it was moving at about the speed of a shooting star, at least at first, which i have seen many other times.  it was a very dark night, and clear, so i was looking up at the stars, and noticed movement, directly above and in front of us.  i would not be able to calculate a distance for the object.  however, at first we all thought it was a shooting star.  however, i never saw any type of tail from the orb, and thought that that was very peculiar.  when i have seen shooting stars in the past, they all had some sort of a tail behind them that glowed with some other colors.
this orb had no tail, and it seemed to slow down as it got closer to the horizon line.  the orb seemed to shift its path slightly to the east/right very slightly as it slowed down above the horizon.  the orb disappeared into the dark horizon line in front of us.
content.summary: Saw a white orb, dropping down from the sky at night, dark clear sky.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of april 28, appx 9pm, i took the trash around to the back yard. i looked up and saw what appeared to be a moving star. it seemed as bright as a medium brigtness star, so i spotted it immediately. i continued to watch this object, looking for any sort of strobe to signinfy this was an aircraft (there was no strobe) for the appx 2-3 minutes it took to go from straight up to the northern horizon. it moved in a straight line. it was getting dimmer as it moved away from me as i expected, but appx 10 seconds before it completely faded from view, it got very bright (it was the brightest object in the sky) for appx 2-3 seconds. i was standing alone,but actually said out loud - wow that got brighter! within 2 seconds, about 5 degrees to the west i saw (2) quick, bright flashes. i assumed this was an aircraft and i told myself "that is what a strobe should look like". i looked back at the object and watched it fade from view appx 5-10 seconds later. i then tried to locate the source of the flashes - there were no aircraft anywhere to be seen.
content.summary: I observed an object travel from south to north, get brighter for appx 2sec, then fade from view.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just oppened my shop and was standing outside. looking up at a white cessna 152 about 1500 feet up.  the cesna was moving slowly from west to east back to my north.  then i noticed a white oblong object aproaching the small airplane maybe 500 feet higher. it was about a third the size of the plane.  it passed right over the airplane and continued from north north east to south south west.
traveling at a high rate of speed. it made the light plane look like it was standing still.  i ran inside and grabed my camera but when i got back outside i could no longer locate it.  i took several pictures of the sky hopeing to get something but nothing showed up on the camera.
content.summary: Mckinney,  white oblong  object

content.detailedDescription:
Summer 2007 i was training with my 8" skywatcher dobson teleskope to catch satelites or even the iss (much too fast) in the nights. i use to train at daytime by following airplanes. this day i had the airplane in sight and followed it with an 25��� ocular. near the right wing i spotted an object looking like a white half transperant plastic bag almost sphere like or like a jellyfish but i can not recall the exact shape. after a view seconds or a minute (plain was already gone) a second object (same look) aproached from the right side, it apears to be smaller and was faster and it somehow flew around the first object like it interacts with the other. i called my girlfrind to look into the teleskope so she can see it aswell she confirmes the objects to be strange. i was not visible without the teleskope and so i had no way taking pictures. as the objects where unspectaculare and due to the fact it is taff to look through the teleskope for a long time (bend down) i lost interest. after investigating online much later i found the objects to be matching the pictures a nasa astronaut took in the orbit. 

i'm sorry for my english (i'm german)

personly i think all evidance availbe is much too bad to be "proove" as my sighting many others are just too bad to proove anything and everyone loughs about ufos and so i dont' tell my litte story to anyone i know.

kind regards
stefan
content.summary: Two white jellyfish like objects visiting an airplane at high altitude germany

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down i57 south between salem and dix it was dark i was talking to my wife when i noticed it off to the left of the highway wich would be west when i seen it i thought it was a metor but then it changed its path i yelled did you see that i repeated it a couple of times in shock my wife looked up and said yes i see it then it did a 45 and we seen a white flash.The crazy part is we got to kentucky and i was talking to a freind i said i think i saw a ufo he looked at me and said that he had just seen a green ball of light on his way home before i even told him what i saw this was 100 miles away the same night just before we did i assume cause that is the direction. it couldnt have been 2 miles away from us it went right over the highway not on an angle but level if not a little upward i know what i saw
content.summary: Green ball of light the size of full size van

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out at a lake picnicing and decided to take pictures of birds. i had spotted a nest with a bird flying around 
and decided to pull to the side of the road to take a picture of
a bird that had landed on top of a post. didn't had time until weeks later to put the pictures on my computer when afterward noticed 
something strange in the background. after using zoombrowser on the picture,we couldn't identify what it was.Hoping someone might be able to give us some sort of insight.Picture enclosed.
content.summary: Taking pictures of birds, nice eagle,get home, download two weeks later, hey, whats that black line...

content.detailedDescription:
This occured while i was sleeping, and while i would call it a dream it was more realistic than that, i felt it was really happening and was able to do a reality check and determined i was indeed "really there" but in a semi-trance state, unable to really react or speak.  

i found myself inside a "craft" of sorts.  it was dimly lit, i was standing in front of a series of screens or projectors, like a 360 degree oval room covered in these screens.  the entire "world / universal history" was playing out over these screens.  i saw the beginning of the universe, the cultivation and population of many planets, and the subsequent fall of many unfamiliar civilizations.  it was though i was being "caught up" on where we are in the universe today.  after i saw all this, then i was shown our own earth.  it was beautiful, so real i could almost touch it.  seeing animals, people, flowers, natural wonders, all so beautiful it almost brought tears to my eyes.  and then seeing decay, destruction, a sense of "impending doom" was there, it made me very afraid, i realized that i was being shown, humans are making a big mistake, we are messing things up.  i was not one to be environmentally conscious prior to this event.  but seeing the world crying out in pain and agony.  and having a "guide" or character dimly identifying "her"self to me through thought alone (no words were spoken, but i understood "her" name was "mother eve" and she had something important to do with the orignial population of the earth as we know it, she cared about the earth and wanted me to see this, because "i was ready and of an open mind to accept this message").  she was probably the same height as me (5'3") and though the room was darkened i made out she had blue/green/gray skin and very large black/brown eyes which she fixed upon me very solemnly and seriously, i felt a gravity of emotion and communication being transmitted between those eyes and my entire entity.  there was saddness and fear and hope and love but no ill will or any kind of malevolent (sp) or bad vibes.  anyways i was shown how all will eventually cease to exist as we know it, but some will survive, there is a "cleansing" going on and things are being done by our very gov't, but i don't remember that part now.  the gov't was something to be looked at with suspicion, is all i can gather, not to be trusted wholeheartedly but to be questioned and viewed with skepticism.  i was told to prepare myself and my family, to learn about self-sufficiency and radical survival methods, to be prepared for a cataclysmic "shift" of types, and to be open minded and expecting of further contacts.  then i feel like i was molecularly swirled in a blender as it were, into blackness, and when i "awoke" it was like "we now return you to your scheduled show" and i was in the middle of a normal dream, which i awoke from and realized i was indeed still in the house and where i had laid down, but i was on my back (not a position i ever consciously choose to sleep in).  there was a red light outside the window and the air conditioner was off.  when i looked to the window the light disappeared and the air conditioner switched back on.  don't know if this is significant or not, as it was a window ac on a "energy timer" but it seemed awfully non-coincidental to me.
content.summary: "abuduction" being inside a "craft" absorbing a series of multimedia history

content.detailedDescription:
Name of photo: kauai, hi 4/20/08

description and date of incident:  date was sunday april 18th. having just arrived in kauai the previous friday evening, we were excited to start our vacation by going to tunnels beach where it was rumored to have the snorkeling in kauai. although we were not able to get into the water due to a white shark sighting shortly before we arrived we did investigate the tunnels. which were ancient caves created by lava flows.

once we had our fill of the caves/tunnels we processed to the beach directly across the street. it was approximately 1-2 pm and the weather was partly cloudy.

we walked toward the beach and i pulled out my brand new jvc hd everio full hd video camera which also took high resolution pictures and started snapping away at my fianc��� who was walking in front of me on the beach. i wanted to take some pictures of her with the waves behind her and set the camera to an auto ���sport��� mode shutter speed which had continuous shooting capabilities. 

so as i had her pose here and there i got in a little bit closer to her and took three continuous shots while. in between snaps of the shutter i noticed what looked like a black dot on the lcd screen i was using to frame her with the waves behind her. it only seemed to appear for a brief second right when i heard the shutter close on the camera. i immediately looked behind her and all around her to make sure it wasn���t some sort of insect or a bid in the sky. i told her what had happened and showed her the picture she also looked around and couldn���t tell what it was. 

kauai is known as the garden island; as such it is the ���only��� hawaiian island that does not allow water skiing, jet skis or even parasailing in most areas. we just happened to be in a very secluded area where there wasn���t anything behind her when i took the shot. the shots you see here are the three consecutive frames i took. in them you can see the wave cresting behind her as they were all taken within a second all at once. the anomaly appears in only the middle frame, and then it���s just gone. 

now while i don���t want to claim it is anything because i didn���t see it with my own eyes, i don���t know what it could be. i would invite anyone to look at the photo, untouched and yet still bewildering to me and see if you can make sense of it.


location: kauai, hi tunnels beach


james chavez (photographer)
julia slusar (pictured)

camera, jvc everio full hd camera
resolution is 1980 x 1080i
sport setting on the shutter 
auto mode
stored internally on a 60 gig hdd
content.summary: Mysterious photograph

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this for my nervous friend. he is a uniformed officer of the law in iowa city, iowa. if someone needs to contact him they need to contact me first. the event took place at 117am on april 25th 2008. he was on his usual night patrol in an area he and i and many other patrol often. the spot was at the corner of scotts blvd and muscatine in iowa city. he was stationary in his car near goodwill warehouse 3825 and looked up in the sky to see a silent yet inteligent light in the sky moving in unidentified motions. he was able to take pictures which strangely resemle others online. at first i thought he was pranking me until i happened to see the goodwill warehouse in one of the pictures. i have three pictures attached, and he took 14 total.
content.summary: Intelligent light formations

content.detailedDescription:
distance to object unknown;height unknown. silent,slow,straight-line motion in approx. nnw direction-away from me. it did not seem to be an aircraft,fixed-wing or rotor. while its` speed may approximate that of a satellite, it was still daylight,and, i think,too low to be one, so satellite unlikely;hot-air balloon also unlikely(no basket visible through binoculars; also greater speed than a balloon).
         my partner first saw it as she looked out through the house window,to view the aftermath of a lovely sunset. at first it did surely seem like an aircraft,a balloon or a star. no tiredness or alcohol involved;quite a clear sky and no other aircraft in the vicinity at the time.  
         the object appeared to be all brightly coloured,somewhere between yellow and white. it had a fixed base with two upward pointing white wings (i have to state the similarity to an angel`s wings!) it was moving at a constant speed,almost directly away from us,so that at first it was difficult to decipher any motion whatsoever. it then gradually merged into some cloud - and all this with no erratic movement. i do not think it to be in any way unusual or exciting.....But we simply were unable to identify it,so i thought it was worth reporting.
content.summary: From ground level,in good evening light,noticed distant "object"moving slowly,horizontally,at unknown height,from me,in nnw(335deg)direction.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i, one other high school girl, and our pastor were traveling home from a church youth meeting in valley city, n.D., and headed toward litchville, n.D. it was a clear, crisp night. it was either late fall or early spring because my mother, who was waiting for us by the church when we arrived in litchville, had the heater on in her car and complained about having to run her heater while she waited for us. i also remember that there were no leaves on the trees. based on my memory of the weather, i believe it was fall. it was a crisp, crystal clear night. i remember the blackness of the sky and the stars shining in the sky. my sister and i were seated in the back seat, she on the left, i on the right. the other girl was in the passenger seat in the front. the pastor was driving. we were near hastings, n.D., on highway 1 when i glanced out the left passenger window and saw a silver metallic disk rise noiselessly from behind a small grove of deciduous trees. i could see lights through the trees, and suddenly the lights began to rise. then, there it was, a ufo hovering just above the trees, which were not very tall, as many north dakota trees are. the disc hung there, not moving, silent. i exclaimed, "there's a ufo!" my sister and i observed it with great excitement. the other girl refused to look or to acknowledge in any way what was happening. she continued to stare straight ahead through the windshield. as we watched, the disc moved laterally, stopping over the car, no more than 30 feet above us, to our left and a little ahead of us. it was shiny and metallic, but more of a dull shine, not like silver. the bottom half looked like a shallow bowl. the top half looked like an inverted shallow bowl, but there was a higher dome in the middle. there were red and green flashing lights alternating around the edge of the rim, where the "bowls" met. my recollection is that there also were white flashing lights, but at this date, 40 years later, i cannot recall the exact configuration of these. there also were windows visible in the higher raised dome, and there was a glow of light from inside the ufo's interior. as we traveled along the highway, it kept perfect pace with us, and my sister and i crowded together in her window and craned our necks to watch it. i could see the clear silhouettes of figures backlit in some windows. in one window, it appeared like several figures were standing together, as though they were trying to get a good look at us. "they're watching us," i said. i also remember saying to my sister that the figures were shorter than us (i am 5'4") because the dome was low. the figures looked grayish, and their their heads looked big compared to their bodies and arms. the windows were tall enough that i could see their heads, their torsos, and part of their legs. i remember saying, "look at how short they are!" at that time, i had read the book, "the interrupted journey," and i was very interested in ufos. i could not believe that i was actually seeing one so close. i remember saying, "maybe they want to make contact with us." this was a very exciting thought to me. i remember saying that i wanted to open the window and acknowledge them in some way. the pastor, who had not commented at all while my sister and i were watching the ufo and exclaiming over it, sharply ordered, "don't you dare!" he said he was just going to keep going the same speed, that we should ignore it, and we were to do nothing to attract attention. despite his warning, my sister and i continued to huddle at her window, staring up at the ufo and the figures in the windows. it followed us for several miles, with the pastor driving at a steady speed and staring straight ahead. as we neared the tiny town of hastings, n.D., the ufo suddenly rose up and sped off at an angle to our right and accelerated at an astonishingly high rate of speed, disappearing to a small distant light in the sky in mere seconds. i remember exclaiming over how amazingly quickly it flew away. i was very excited about the experience and kept talking about how i couldn't believe we had just seen what we did. i pointedly asked the girl in the front, "_________, can you believe we saw that?!" she replied, without turning around, "i didn't see anything." my sister and i just looked at each other and rolled our eyes. when we arrived in litchville and stopped at the church, my sister and i could hardly wait to get out of the car and talk to our mother, who was waiting for us. the pastor sharply ordered us not to get out until he talked to us. he ordered us not to speak one word of what had just happened. he specifically told us we were not to tell our parents about it. i argued with him a little, and said we should be able to tell the truth. he said that people would think he was crazy if anyone heard about this and that if we told anyone what we had seen and that he was with us, "i will deny it." even though this happened 40 years ago, it is still vivid in my memory. at that time, in the late 1960s, few people talked about seeing ufos. of course, my sister and i immediately told our mother the whole story. she believed us and told us she had often wondered about lights she had seen in the sky near a farm about 1/4 mile away from ours. as for the other girl, i do not think i ever talked to her about it again, and i certainly did not talk to the pastor about it. i will never forget being that close to a ufo and seeing it so clearly. it was one of the most amazing experiences of my life.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Metallic looking disc rose from behind trees, moved above car, followed car above and slightly to left of car as we traveled on highway number 1 between valley city and litchville, n.D. it suddenly, rapidly sped off, disappearing in seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the meeting with my friend and dropped her off at her home...She saw it..And ran to tell her family...I drove home and it shot past me like a bullet...I am exmilitary, retired nurse, and that expierence scared me too death!!!I was shapped like a huge disc but had windows or like windows all around the front of it....Then they started flashing red, blue and green....I didn't see any white lights like a plane would have and it made no sound at all!!!What really amaized me was it stopping dead and not moving with no sound not even a whoose!!
content.summary: Huge object , larger than the football field where i was passing, blue and green lights with lots of chrome looking features and glass.....

content.detailedDescription: On the above mentioned date and at the above mentioned time, i was at my parents house. we had been watching television. since it was a warm night, i decided to step out onto the porch. i happened to look to my left at the mountains, which are north of my parents house about maybe a few hundred yards. above the mountains, i noticed a large, triangle shaped object with lights on the vertices, and two smaller ball shaped lights a short distance behind it, hovering over the mountain.This of course was quite unsettling. at first i thought these were the lights of a plane or other aircraft, but the absence of sound ruled that out. as i watched, the object began to glide slowly in a southerly direction, the two trailing lights followed at the same pace. i stood there and watched these objects until they traversed the valleya and dissapeared beyond the mountains on the other side of the valley.
content.summary: I stepped out onto my parents porch, looked  up at the mountain and saw an object hovering over the mountain
